comments:
Build 20031104

While the PDE plug-in import wizard was importing binary plug-ins into an 
existing workspace (after upgrading to the new build), a dialog appeared:
Title: Type Hierarchy
Message: Creating hierarchy failed. Check log for details
Detail: Path must include project and resource name: /org.eclipse.jdt.launching

The hierarchy view was visible, btw. :-)
Moving to JDT/Core first. Not sure if this is a JDT or a resource problem.

According to the stack trace, IWorkspaceRoot.findMember
("/org.eclipse.jdt.launching") throws this exception because it found 
that "/org.eclipse.jdt.launching" was of type IResource.FOLDER.

This sounds like the workspace was corrupt. Moving to Platform Core for 
comments.
I haven't seen it again. We don't import binary plugins anymore either. :)

causedBy.message: Path must include project and  resource name: /org.eclipse.jdt.launching
